Johannesburg - A man was arrested after CCTV footage allegedly showed him shooting another man dead in Pietermaritzburg , KwaZulu-Natal police said on Monday .
Johannesburg - A man was arrested after CCTV footage allegedly showed him shooting another man dead in Pietermaritzburg , KwaZulu-Natal police said on Monday .
The shooting happened on Sunday morning on Church Street , Captain Thulani Zwane said .
